Package eapli.framework.persistence.repositories.impl.jpa

Provides a generic base class for implementing repositories using JPA. this class is compatible with the Repository interface defined in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JpaAutoTxRepository<T,K extends Serializable>
    A JPA repository implementation for use with applications not running inside a container. this class can either support working within a TransactionalContext or a single immediate transaction mode. if running in single immediate mode a transaction is initiated, committed and the connection closed in the scope of each repository method call.
    JpaBaseRepository<T,K extends Serializable>
    An utility class for implementing JPA repositories.
    JpaTransactionalRepository<T,K extends Serializable>
    An utility class for implementing JPA repositories not running in containers and not relying on external transaction managers.
    MoneyAmountConverter
    To avoid breaking the information hiding principle, we convert the value stored in cents when saving it to the store and divide it back again when reading it.

Package eapli.framework.persistence.repositories.impl.jpa Description

Provides a generic base class for implementing repositories using JPA. this class is compatible with the Repository interface defined in eapli.framework.persistence.repositories
Author:
Paulo Gandra Sousa
